Reviews.Title: C7-00 worked for less than 2 months, GSM hardware bug.
Reviews.Author: John "Techie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone after my Nokia E71 was stolen in Dade area, south Florida.  I was used to have a keyboard so the touch screen was a be problem for me.  Also I would touch the screen by accident will holding it and a function would be issued usually changing my default configurations.After about 50 days using my phone I noticed that I was loosing calls because my GSM network would simple disconnect.  Since I still use other phones (with other lines that I have) I noticed that they were working perfect with GSM network.  I then did a SIM swap to check, and Bingo!  Hardware bug!  After searching google, I found out that other owners also had encountered the same problem.  I will try to return it.NOKIA now has lower quality making me very sad with the brand that I used, with no issues, for so many years.Also the lack of macro for the camera is a big issue if you like take photos of business cards and magazine pages.  This is very bad for me, specially at work.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 4 Lyfe
Reviews.Author: r3dd219
Reviews.Content: No matter what happens, I can always count on a Nokia phone to do the job, and that job, and that job too... I needed a real phone with multiple options. This phone runs off the TMobile network and comes with built-in MP3 player/Radio with the option to expand the memory up to 32gig with an sd memory card, 7megapixel flash camera/video camcorder, app friendly, wifi connection, and the ability to connect to a bluetooth. My old phone (Samsung T258G: StraightTalk) would cut off at various times but not this phone... I love how when you touch it, it vibrates slightly letting you know that a selection has been made. This item was ordered with an average shipping speed but still came within 3 days of ordering it. The price was affordable for a phone of this calibur. I love my new Nokia... I know its not the most up-to-date phone, but it suites my daily needs just fine... I'd recommend this phone to anyone (well, I recommend Nokia period). The only phone where I can perform any other function (text/pix, camera/video, even access my internet) while I'm talking on it to someone :-)

Reviews.Title: Sent me a T Mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: I ordered a used Nokia C-7 from Amazon Warehouse...condition 'LIKE NEW" The phone arrives in a plain white box...no Nokia box. This phones condition was terrible, scratches, chips all over the phone. It was also branded T Mobile. I did not even put the battery in. I sent it back right away. This was the worst experience ever with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product, just whatt I expected, funcional, very nice and practical. Recomended 100 % for everybody. Quality and economy together.

Reviews.Title: Too bad
Reviews.Author: Edmundo Garcia
Reviews.Content: This phone is garbage first of all when I received it they sent in a generic box not original, leave the bag where the phone was broken. after 3 months of use at the entrance where you put the charger was damaged and therefore I have seen the need to charge it via usb. I feel cheated by this company that they sold me a phone that looks used. I could not return because I buy from Venezuela and by the time the product came into my hands the warranty had expired. I say this because property previously made ''a purchase from a nokia n8 sold by amazon is spectacular and everything perfect.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: JULIO C.
Reviews.Content: un celular muy bueno. versatil y duradero. Un equipo nokia es un equipo bueno. el producto llego a tiempo y tal como se ofertaba.

Reviews.Title: Pretty horrible phone
Reviews.Author: S. Gerges "bookworm"
Reviews.Content: The phone lasts for about 3 months, but because the touch screen was poorly designed, the phone cannot handle the functions demanded with. It's slow, restarts on its own and I can't wait to get rid of it. It's a decent phone, but just doesn't hold up, you are much better off using the iphone.

Reviews.Title: Nokia C7 Astound
Reviews.Author: Parag
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone four months ago.Pros:It looks good.Is rugged. I have dropped it couple of times,accidentaly and still it did not have any scratches or blemishes.The touchscreen interface is good.Good Battery life.Call quality is good.Applications are fast.Games are fast and dont get stuck like they do on my other Nokia 5530.Web Browser interface is good. The zoom in zoom out is just like iphones.Cons:Web browser is slow.I have a nokia 5530 Musicexpress.The web browser on that one is much faster than this.The Ovistore is stuck on an update. And everytime i run it it downloads and tries to install the update and gets stuck. I let it run for 2 hours at a stretch. But it was not able to install it.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't call it a "smart" phone
Reviews.Author: Ryan J. Flynn
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for about 2 months, then it starting having major problems. Any apps or games downloaded would not load correctly. I put approx 43 songs on it to listen to at the gym and it just crapped out on me, ever since i put the music on it, (which was taken off immediately) i have memory error messages consistently.Web browser is slow, speakers have crapped out and have that fuzzy noise in them. I have never dropped or spilled anything on this phone and it barely works.The only reason i didn't give it 1 star is that the organization of contacts is nice and it's easy to text on, other than that, worst phone i have ever had

Reviews.Title: nokia c7 or c6-001
Reviews.Author: mike weezy
Reviews.Content: i decided to buy the c-7 b.c its better version of the c-6 001 and little bigger in size hope i like this brand of nokia nokia is always in the top when it comes to making cell phones way better than i phone personal opinion check out the latest nokia proudct the n-8 and the n-9 wow
